tasks.bump: deno run -A scripts/bump-version.ts && git add deno.json lib/version.ts */deno.json && git commit -m 'Bump version'
tasks.tag: git tag v$(jq -r .version deno.json) && git push origin --tags
tasks.test: deno fmt && deno lint --fix && deno task test:all
tasks.test:all: deno task test:cli && deno task test:lib && deno task test:maml
